questions.onset: When did the headache start? Was it sudden (thunderclap) or gradual?
questions.severity: On a scale of 1-10, how severe is the headache? Is it the worst headache of your life?
questions.location: Where is the headache located? (front, back, side, all over)
questions.character: How would you describe the pain? (throbbing, sharp, dull, pressure)
questions.associated_symptoms: Do you have any other symptoms like vision changes, weakness, confusion, stiff neck, fever, or nausea?
questions.duration: How long have you had this headache?

triage_rules.expression: 'sudden' in str(onset).lower() and int(severity) >= 8 and ('worst' in str(severity).lower() or 'thunderclap' in str(onset).lower())
triage_rules.reason: Thunderclap headache - Possible Subarachnoid Hemorrhage (SAH) - Immediate Emergency Care Required

triage_rules.expression: ('stiff neck' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'confusion' in str(associated_symptoms).lower()) and 'fever' in str(associated_symptoms).lower()
triage_rules.reason: Headache with meningeal signs - Possible Meningitis - Immediate Emergency Care Required

triage_rules.expression: 'weakness' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'vision' in str(associated_symptoms).lower() or 'confusion' in str(associated_symptoms).lower()
triage_rules.reason: Headache with neurological symptoms - Urgent evaluation needed
